author: Brad Colbow
description:
NEW COURSES: http://bradsartschool.com

The Boox Air4 C is the sequel to one of my all time favorite E Ink tablets. I like it better than the Remarkable Paper Pro and the Kindle becuase it runs full android. But it's also a bit of a mixed bag for drawing.
